My Projects

Pet Story

Teck Stack : ASP.NET , React JS , Microsoft SQL

This is my first React project. I created this project for my university's graduation project course. I was already familiar with the technologies I used, but React JS was a new technology for me. It was prepared as an animal adoption website with all the necessary products for animals. The responsive structure may not be perfect, but it was my first experience with React JS.
